desc: The amazing EZ Frame is the most useful and practical horizontal banner display ever! It's an economical and attractive way to display banners above tabletops for any kind of promotional purpose - conferences, sales events, fairs, and countless other business and recreational uses

layout.text: The Amazing EZFrame is the most useful and practical horizontal banner display ever! It's an economical and attractive way to display banners above table tops for any kind of promotional purpose - conferences, sales events, fairs, and countless other creative uses.
